CustomField.formula:
IF((ISPICKVAL(Case_Type_Config__c,'Collection-Redemption Konven MPS')||ISPICKVAL(Case_Type_Config__c,'Collection-Withdrawal MPS'))&& Currency__c='USD', Amount__c * 14000,
IF((ISPICKVAL(Case_Type_Config__c,'Collection-Redemption Konven MPS')||ISPICKVAL(Case_Type_Config__c,'Collection-Withdrawal MPS'))&& Currency__c!='USD',Amount__c,
0))
CustomField.label: APE Convert MPS
